resources.string: The app requires Location services to run. Would you like to enable them now?
The app requires Mobile Data to run. Would you like to enable them now?
The app requires both Mobile Data and Location Services with High Accuracy enabled.\n\n Please enable them before continuing.

The app requires both Mobile Data and Location Services with High Accuracy enabled.

 Try to improve your signal by being in an open area.

 If no satellites are shown, it is possible your phone does not support access to raw satellite signal.

 You can still use the app using native Android Location service.
If no Galileo satellites are shown, it is possible your phone hardware does not support Galileo navigation.\n\n You can still use the app wih GPS only.

Powered by GNSS Compare


Created with support from the European Space Agency (ESA) as part of the ESA Galileo App Competition.
